data.name: CannotWriteResultToolMissing
data.value: Cannot write result: Tool not yet written.

data.name: InvalidParentXml
data.value: Element expected to be located under a different parent element.

data.name: InvalidState
data.value: One or more invalid states were detected during serialization. This indicates that logging methods were called in the wrong order: {0}

data.name: ResultsSerializationNotComplete
data.value: Object cannot be serialized until results serialization is completed.

data.name: RunAlreadyWritten
data.value: Run has already been written. It cannot be written again.

data.name: ToolAlreadyWritten
data.value: Tool has already been written. It cannot be written again.

data.name: LineNumberWasOutOfRange
data.value: Line number supplied was out of range [1, numberOfLinesInFile + 1)

data.name: MSG001_AnalyzingTarget
data.value: Analyzing '{0}'.

data.name: WRN997_InvalidTarget
data.value: '{0}' was not analyzed as it does not appear to be a valid file type for analysis.

data.name: NotApplicable_InvalidMetadata
data.value: '{0}' was not evaluated for check '{1}' because the analysis is not relevant for the following reason: {2}.

data.name: MSG_AnalysisCompletedSuccessfully
data.value: Analysis completed successfully.

data.name: MSG_Analyzing
data.value: Analyzing...

data.name: MSG_UnexpectedApplicationExit
data.value: Analysis did not complete due to one or more unrecoverable execution conditions.

data.name: ERR997_ExceptionAccessingFile
data.value: Could not access a file specified on the command line: '{0}'.

data.name: ERR997_ExceptionCreatingOutputFile
data.value: Could not create output file '{0}'.

data.name: ERR998_ExceptionInAnalyze
data.value: An exception of type '{0}' was raised analyzing '{1}' for check '{2}' (which has been disabled). The exception may have resulted from a problem related to parsing the analysis target, and not specific to the rule, however.

data.name: ERR998_ExceptionInCanAnalyze
data.value: An exception was raised attempting to determine whether '{0}' is a valid analysis target for check '{1}' (which has been disabled). The exception may have resulted from a problem related to parsing the analysis target and not specific to the rule, however.

data.name: ERR998_ExceptionInInitialize
data.value: An exception was raised initializing check '{0}' (which has been disabled).

data.name: ERR997_ExceptionInstantiatingSkimmers
data.value: Could not instantiate skimmers from the following plugins: {0}.

data.name: ERR997_ExceptionLoadingAnalysisTarget
data.value: Could not load analysis target '{0}' ({1} : '{2}').

data.name: ERR997_ExceptionLoadingPlugIn
data.value: Could not load the plugin '{0}'.

data.name: ERR997_MissingFile
data.value: A required file specified on the command line could not be found: '{0}'.

data.name: ERR997_MissingReportingConfiguration
data.value: Check '{0}' was disabled while analyzing '{1}' because the analysis was not configured with required policy ({2}). To resolve this, configure and provide a policy file on the {3} command-line using the --policy argument (recommended), or pass '--config default' to invoke built-in settings. Invoke the {3} 'exportConfig' command to produce an initial configuration file that can be edited, if necessary, and passed back into the tool.

data.name: ERR997_NoRulesLoaded
data.value: Could not instantiate any analysis rules.

data.name: ERR997_NoValidAnalysisTargets
data.value: No valid analysis targets were specified.

data.name: ValueCannotBeNegative
data.value: The value cannot be negative.

data.name: ValueMustBeAtLeastOne
data.value: The value must be greater than or equal to 1.

data.name: CallGenericGetProperty
data.value: The non-generic GetProperty method only works for properties that are JSON strings. To retrieve a property with any other .NET type, call the generic method GetProperty<T>(string propertyName), where T is the .NET type of the object stored in the specified property.

data.name: PropertyDoesNotExist
data.value: Property '{0}' does not exist. Consider calling TryGetProperty instead.

data.name: PropertyOfValueTypeCannotBeNull
data.value: The property bag contains a property {0} with the value null. It cannot be converted to the value type {1}.

data.name: ResultRuleIdDoesNotMatchRule
data.value: The rule id '{0}' specified by the result does not match the actual id of the rule '{1}'

data.name: AnnotatedCodeLocationIdMustBePositive
data.value: '{0}' is not a valid value for the id property of an threadFlowLocation object. The value must be a positive integer or the string representation of a positive integer.

data.name: UnexpectedFatalRuntimeConditions
data.value: Unexpected fatal runtime condition(s) observed:

data.name: MSG_OneOrMoreInvalidTargets
data.value: One or more targets was skipped entirely as it was determined to be an invalid target for analysis. Include 'Note' on an explicit '--level ' command-line argument (e.g., '--level "Error;Warning;Note"') for more information.

data.name: MSG_OneOrMoreNotApplicable
data.value: One or more rules was disabled for an analysis target, as it was determined not to be applicable to it (this is a common condition). Include 'NotApplicable' on an explicit '--kind' command-line argument (e.g., '--kind "Fail;NotApplicable"') for more information.

data.name: ERR997_InvalidInvocationPropertyName
data.value: '{0}' is not a property of the Invocation object.

data.name: WRN998_NotSupportedPlatform
data.value: Rule '{0}' was disabled as it cannot run on the current platform '{1}'. It can only run on '{2}'.

data.name: WRN999_RuleExplicitlyDisabled
data.value: Rule '{0}' was explicitly disabled by the user. As result, this tool run cannot be used for compliance or other auditing processes that require a comprehensive analysis.

data.name: ERR997_AllRulesExplicitlyDisabled
data.value: All rules were explicitly disabled so there is no work to do.

data.name: ERR997_FileAlreadyExists
data.value: The output file '{0}' already exists. Use --log ForceOverwrite to overwrite.

data.name: PartioningVisitHappensAtSarifLogLevel
data.value: Could not identify the log being partitioned. Call VisitSarifLog and provide the log to partition. This class is designed to create log files on a per-run basis (i.e., all partioned logs will contain a single run only).

data.name: CannotProvideVersionControlDetails
data.value: Cannot provide version control information because the current directory '{0}' is not under a Git repository root directory.

data.name: GitHelperDefaultInstanceDoesNotPermitCaching
data.value: When using the static 'Default' instance of GitHelper, you must pass the argument useCache: false to GetRepositoryRoot, which degrades performance. If the performance is not acceptable, create a separate GitHelper instance. You need not pass useCache: true because that is the default.

data.name: ErrorInvalidQueryPropertyName
data.value: The property name '{0}' is unrecognized. Known property names: baselineState, correlationGuid, guid, hostedViewerUri, kind, level, message.text, occurrenceCount, rank, ruleId You can also refer to properties in the result's property bag with 'properties.<propertyName>', or to properties in the associated rule's property bag with 'properties.rule.<propertyName>'.

data.name: ErrorInvalidQueryPropertyPrefix
data.value: Property name must start with one of: {0}

data.name: WRN997_ObsoleteOption
data.value: Option '{0}' is obsolete.

data.name: WRN997_ObsoleteOptionWithReplacement
data.value: Option '{0}' is obsolete. Use '{1}' instead.

data.name: ComputeFileHashes_ReplaceInsertHashes
data.value: --insert Hashes

data.name: EnvironmentVariable_Additive_Format
data.value: SARIF_{0}_ADDITION

data.name: WRN997_InvalidOption
data.value: Option '{0}' is invalid for this command.

data.name: ERR997_NoPluginsConfigured
data.value: No plugins were configured or successfully located and so no rules were loaded.

data.name: WRN997_OneOrMoreFilesSkippedDueToExceedingSizeLimit
data.value: {0} file(s) were skipped for analysis due to exceeding size limit (currently configured as {1} KB). The 'max-file-size-in-kb' command-line argument can be used to increase this threshold.

data.name: MSG002.FileExceedingSizeLimitSkipped
data.value: '{0}' was not analyzed as its size ({1} kilobytes) exceeds the currently configured threshold ({2} kilobytes).

data.name: ERR997_IncompatibleRulesDetected
data.value: The current configuration enables rules that are not compatible ('{0}' has declared that it is not compatible with '{1}'). You can selectively disable one of the rules using an updated XML configuration (passed by the --config argument).

data.name: ERR997_MissingCommandlineArgument
data.value: The {0} argument(s) must be specified when using {1}.

data.name: ERR999_AnalysisCanceled
data.value: Analysis was canceled.

data.name: ERR999_AnalysisTimedOut
data.value: Analysis timed out. Timeout specified was {0}).

data.name: MSG001_TargetAnalyzed
data.value: Completed '{0}'.

data.name: MSG002.EmptyFileSkipped
data.value: '{0}' was skipped because it is empty (zero bytes in size).
